indicatorDefinitions.name: patients
indicatorDefinitions.label: patients
indicatorDefinitions.description: Total number of patients

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs
indicatorDefinitions.description: Total # of patients who are on ARVs

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs_first_line
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs first line
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient on ARVs first line

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs_second_line
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs second line
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient on ARVs second line
indicatorDefinitions.expression: cur_arv_line=2 and coalesce(transfer_out, out_of_care) is null

indicatorDefinitions.name: newly_on_second_line
indicatorDefinitions.label: newly on second line
indicatorDefinitions.description: patient newly on second line within a given period

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs_third_line
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs third line
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient on ARVs third line

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_done_past_year
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl done past year
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load have been taken in the past 1 year

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_done_past_year_relative_to_end_date
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl done past year relative to end date
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load have been taken in the past 1 year

indicatorDefinitions.name: no_vl_done_past_year
indicatorDefinitions.label: no vl done past year
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load have not been taken in the past 1 year
indicatorDefinitions.expression: cur_arv_line is not null and (vl_1_date is null or timestampdiff(week,vl_1_date,encounter_datetime) >= 52)

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_done_past_year_lte_1000
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl done past year lte 1000
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load is Less Than or Equal to 1000

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_second_line_not_suppressed
indicatorDefinitions.label: on second line not suppressed
indicatorDefinitions.description: patient on second line not suppressed

indicatorDefinitions.name: not_on_arvs_cd4_lte_500
indicatorDefinitions.label: not on arvs cd4 lte 500
indicatorDefinitions.description: patients who qualify for ART but are not on therapy

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_done_past_year_gt_1000
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl done past year gt 1000
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load is Greater Than 1000

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_done_this_encounter
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl done this encounter
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load has been taken in this encounter

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_done_this_encounter_lte_1000
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl done this encounter lte 1000
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load in this encounter is Less Than 1000

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_done_this_encounter_gt_1000
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl done this encounter gt 1000
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load in this encounter is Greater Than 1000

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_ordered
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl ordered
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load has been ordered

indicatorDefinitions.name: pending_vl_order
indicatorDefinitions.label: pending vl order
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Viral Load has been Ordered but awaiting result

indicatorDefinitions.name: pending_vl_order_no_result_after_4_weeks
indicatorDefinitions.label: pending vl order no result after 4 weeks
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) whose Pending Viral Load Result is missing even after 4 weeks

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs_lte_26_weeks
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs lte 26 weeks
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) who have been on ARVs for the last 26 weeks or less

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs_lte_52_weeks
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs lte 52 weeks
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) who have been on ARVs for the last 52 weeks or less

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs_lte_52_weeks_and_have_vl
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs lte 52 weeks and have vl
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) who have been on ARVs for the last 52 weeks or less and have Viral Load

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs_lte_52_weeks_and_have_vl_lte_1000
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs lte 52 weeks and have vl lte 1000
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) who have been on ARVs for the last 52 weeks or less and their Viral Load is Less Than or Equal to 1000

indicatorDefinitions.name: pregnant
indicatorDefinitions.label: pregnant
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of pregnant patients in a given time period

indicatorDefinitions.name: pregnant_and_on_arvs
indicatorDefinitions.label: pregnant and on arvs
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of pregnant patients and are on ARVs in a given time period
indicatorDefinitions.expression: edd > encounter_datetime and cur_arv_line is not null

indicatorDefinitions.name: viral_load_resulted_in_past_year
indicatorDefinitions.label: viral load resulted in past year
indicatorDefinitions.description: patient(s) whose viral load has resulted in the past one year

indicatorDefinitions.name: virally_suppressed_in_past_year
indicatorDefinitions.label: virally suppressed in past year
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) who are virally suppressed in the past one year

indicatorDefinitions.name: not_virally_suppressed_in_past_year
indicatorDefinitions.label: not virally suppressed in past year
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) who are not virally suppressed in the past one year

indicatorDefinitions.name: perc_virally_suppressed_in_past_year
indicatorDefinitions.label: perc virally suppressed in past year
indicatorDefinitions.description: % of  patient(s) who are virally suppressed in the past one year

indicatorDefinitions.name: perc_not_virally_suppressed_in_past_year
indicatorDefinitions.label: perc not virally suppressed in past year
indicatorDefinitions.description: % of  patient(s) who are not virally suppressed in the past one year

indicatorDefinitions.name: perc_on_arvs
indicatorDefinitions.label: perc on arvs
indicatorDefinitions.description: % of patients who are on ARVs

indicatorDefinitions.name: perc_on_arv_first_line
indicatorDefinitions.label: perc on arv first line
indicatorDefinitions.description: % of patients on ARVs first line

indicatorDefinitions.name: perc_on_arv_second_line
indicatorDefinitions.label: perc on arv second line
indicatorDefinitions.description: % of patients on ARVs second line

indicatorDefinitions.name: perc_with_pending_viral_load
indicatorDefinitions.label: perc with pending viral load
indicatorDefinitions.description: % of patients with pending viral load

indicatorDefinitions.name: perc_on_arvs_lte_6_months
indicatorDefinitions.label: perc on arvs lte 6 months
indicatorDefinitions.description: % of patients who have been on ARVs for less than 6 months

indicatorDefinitions.name: on_arvs_gt_26_weeks
indicatorDefinitions.label: on arvs gt 26 weeks
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patient(s) who have been on ARVs 26 weeks or more

indicatorDefinitions.name: perc_on_arvs_gt_6_months
indicatorDefinitions.label: perc on arvs gt 6 months
indicatorDefinitions.description: % of patients who have been on  ARVs for more than 6 months

indicatorDefinitions.name: transfer_in_patients
indicatorDefinitions.label: transfer in patients
indicatorDefinitions.description: These are patients who transferred into the selected facility within the reporting period

indicatorDefinitions.name: patients_with_vl_result
indicatorDefinitions.label: patients with vl result
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patients with vl

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_suppressed_patients
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl suppressed patients
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patients with vl < 1000

indicatorDefinitions.name: vl_unsuppressed_patients
indicatorDefinitions.label: vl unsuppressed patients
indicatorDefinitions.description: # of patients with vl >= 1000

indicatorDefinitions.name: early_scheduled_visits
indicatorDefinitions.label: early scheduled visits
indicatorDefinitions.description: Early Scheduled visit

indicatorDefinitions.name: late_scheduled_visits
indicatorDefinitions.label: late scheduled visits
indicatorDefinitions.description: Late scheduled visit
